column2: Smith Micro Software, Inc. engages in the provision of software solutions. The company is headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and currently employs 161 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Wireless and Graphics. The firm offers multi-platform, modular solutions organized into three product families, including NetWise, CommSuite and QuickLink. For mobile network operators, NetWise helps reduce cellular congestion and optimize data traffic across third-generation (3G), fourth-generation (4G) and wireless fidelity (Wi-Fi) networks. Graphics segment includes its consumer-based products, such as Poser, Anime Studio, Manga Studio, MotionArtist and StuffIt. The Graphics segment develops a range of software, including graphic design and animation, compression and personal computer (PC)/Mac utilities, for consumers, professional artists and educators. The firm also offers Family Safety platform for family locator and parental controls.
